description: Tenant asks for the building's fire safety regulations; the assistant fetches the relevant document and supplies a download link.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent that can retrieve lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send reminders, schedule repairs, update payment status, and generate financial reports for property managers and tenants.
Hi, could you please send me a copy of the building’s fire safety regulations? I need to review them.
Sure, I’ll retrieve the fire safety regulations document for your building.

Here is the fire safety regulations document for your building: https://storage.rentwise.io/documents/PROP123_fire_safety_regulations.pdf
If you have any questions about the content, feel free to let me know!
